mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.order_no as orderNo, o.spare_part_id as sparePartId, o.supplier_id as supplierId, o.order_qty as orderQty, o.unit_price as unitPrice, o.total_amount as totalAmount, o.order_status as orderStatus, o.expected_date as expectedDate, o.actual_date as actualDate, o.reorder_suggest_id as reorderSuggestId, o.purchaser_id as purchaserId, o.remark, o.created_at as createdAt, o.updated_at as updatedAt, sp.code as sparePartCode, sp.name as sparePartName, s.name as supplierName, u.name as purchaserName FROM biz_purchase_order o LEFT JOIN spare_part sp ON o.spare_part_id = sp.id LEFT JOIN supplier s ON o.supplier_id = s.id LEFT JOIN user u ON o.purchaser_id = u.id WHERE o.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_purchase_order SET order_status = #{orderStatus} WHERE id = #{id}
